name: Rice and sausage stuffing
recipeIngredient: 1/2 pound sausage meat, sweet or hot
2 1/2 cups mushrooms cut into half-inch cubes
1 teaspoon finely chopped dried or fresh rosemary

recipeInstructions.text: Put the sausage meat and onion in a saucepan, and cook, stirring to break up lumps, until the meat loses its raw look and the onion is wilted. Add the garlic, celery, green peppers and mushrooms, and cook, stirring occasionally, about five minutes.
Drain the sausage mixture, if desired, and return it to the saucepan. Add the rosemary and stir to blend. Add the rice, salt and pepper, and stir. Let cool briefly.
